title: TF 0.6.0 build fails with bazel 0.1.5
body_html:
Try to build TF ver. 0.6 with Bazel 0.1.5, got this:

ERROR: /tensorflow/WORKSPACE:70:1: new_git_repository rule //external:iron-ajax' s name field must be a legal workspace name.
